In order to make this
Ikan Bakar, it's actually

cooked on a hot skillet,
but what they do first

is they take the fish, they
put it into the Sambal,

which is the chili sauce
blend, they actually dunk it

into the Sambal, then they
wrap it in a banana leaf

and stick it onto the hot
griddle and that sort of like,

the banana leaf keeps the flavor
in so it grills and roasts

and bakes and just simmers
it in it's own juices
and chili sauce all at the same time.
It goes up in a cloud of steam and smoke,
